availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peres R. Randall (Boyd County, KY, physician)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, physician. Maine native. Married to Mahala J. May Randall. Father of Delutha Randall, George Ann Randall, and Peres M.G. Randall. Doctor in Lawrence County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Boyd County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 5th West Virginia Volunteer Infantry Regiment as a surgeon from September 14, 1861, to September 20, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 77B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 806.
Wisconsin Death Records, Pre-Oct 1907, Wisconsin Department of Health Services, Madison, WI, File 01426.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of West Virginia, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M508, Roll 129.
